00001 //   MeCab: Yet Another Part-of-Speech and Morphological Analyzer
00002 //
00003 //   $Id: lbfgs.c 1528 2006-08-07 02:39:50Z taku $;
00004 //
00005 //   lbfgs.c was ported from the FORTRAN code of lbfgs.m to C
00006 //   using f2c converter
00007 //
00008 //   http://www.ece.northwestern.edu/~nocedal/lbfgs.html
00009 //
00010 //   Software for Large-scale Unconstrained Optimization
00011 //   L-BFGS is a limited-memory quasi-Newton code for unconstrained
00012 //   optimization.
00013 //   The code has been developed at the Optimization Technology Center,
00014 //   a joint venture of Argonne National Laboratory and Northwestern University.
00015 //
00016 //   Authors
00017 //   Jorge Nocedal
00018 //
00019 //   References
00020 //   - J. Nocedal. Updating Quasi-Newton Matrices with Limited Storage(1980),
00021 //   Mathematics of Computation 35, pp. 773-782.
00022 //   - D.C. Liu and J. Nocedal. On the Limited Memory Method for
00023 //   Large Scale Optimization(1989),
00024 //   Mathematical Programming B, 45, 3, pp. 503-528.
00025 #include <cmath>
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <numeric>
00028 #include "lbfgs.h"
00029 #include "common.h"
00030 
00031 #define min(a, b) ((a) <= (b) ? (a) : (b))
00032 #define max(a, b) ((a) >= (b) ? (a) : (b))
00033 
00034 namespace {
00035 static const double ftol = 1e-4;
00036 static const double xtol = 1e-16;
00037 static const double eps  = 1e-7;
00038 static const double lb3_1_gtol = 0.9;
00039 static const double lb3_1_stpmin = 1e-20;
00040 static const double lb3_1_stpmax = 1e20;
00041 static const int lb3_1_mp = 6;
00042 static const int lb3_1_lp = 6;
00043 
00044 inline double sigma(double x) {
00045   if (x > 0) return 1.0;
00046   else if (x < 0) return -1.0;
00047   return 0.0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 inline double pi(double x, double y) {
00051   return sigma(x) == sigma(y) ?x : 0.0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline void daxpy_(int n, double da, const double *dx, double *dy) {
00055   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00056     dy[i] += da * dx[i];
00057 }
00058 
00059 inline double ddot_(int size, const double *dx, const double *dy) {
00060   return std::inner_product(dx, dx + size, dy, 0.0);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void mcstep(double *stx, double *fx, double *dx,
00064             double *sty, double *fy, double *dy,
00065             double *stp, double fp, double dp,
00066             int *brackt,
00067             double stpmin, double stpmax,
00068             int *info) {
00069   bool bound = true;
00070   double p, q, s, d1, d2, d3, r, gamma, theta, stpq, stpc, stpf;
00071   *info = 0;
00072 
00073   if (*brackt && ((*stp <= min(*stx, *sty) || *stp >= max(*stx, *sty)) ||
00074                   *dx * (*stp - *stx) >= 0.0 || stpmax < stpmin)) {
00075     return;
00076   }
00077 
00078   double sgnd = dp * (*dx / std::abs(*dx));
00079 
00080   if (fp > *fx) {
00081     *info = 1;
00082     bound = true;
00083     theta =(*fx - fp) * 3 / (*stp - *stx) + *dx + dp;
00084     d1 = std::abs(theta);
00085     d2 = std::abs(*dx);
00086     d1 = max(d1, d2);
00087     d2 = std::abs(dp);
00088     s = max(d1, d2);
00089     d1 = theta / s;
00090     gamma = s * std::sqrt(d1 * d1 - *dx / s *(dp / s));
00091     if (*stp < *stx) {
00092       gamma = -gamma;
00093     }
00094     p = gamma - *dx + theta;
00095     q = gamma - *dx + gamma + dp;
00096     r = p / q;
00097     stpc = *stx + r * (*stp - *stx);
00098     stpq = *stx + *dx / ((*fx - fp) /
00099                          (*stp - *stx) + *dx) / 2 * (*stp - *stx);
00100     if ((d1 = stpc - *stx, std::abs(d1)) < (d2 = stpq - *stx, std::abs(d2))) {
00101       stpf = stpc;
00102     } else {
00103       stpf = stpc + (stpq - stpc) / 2;
00104     }
00105     *brackt = true;
00106   } else if (sgnd < 0.0) {
00107     *info = 2;
00108     bound = false;
00109     theta = (*fx - fp) * 3 / (*stp - *stx) + *dx + dp;
00110     d1 = std::abs(theta);
00111     d2 = std::abs(*dx);
00112     d1 = max(d1, d2);
00113     d2 = std::abs(dp);
00114     s = max(d1, d2);
00115     d1 = theta / s;
00116     gamma = s * std::sqrt(d1 * d1 - *dx / s * (dp / s));
00117     if (*stp > *stx) {
00118       gamma = -gamma;
00119     }
00120     p = gamma - dp + theta;
00121     q = gamma - dp + gamma + *dx;
00122     r = p / q;
00123     stpc = *stp + r *(*stx - *stp);
00124     stpq = *stp + dp /(dp - *dx) * (*stx - *stp);
00125     if ((d1 = stpc - *stp, std::abs(d1)) > (d2 = stpq - *stp, std::abs(d2))) {
00126       stpf = stpc;
00127     } else {
00128       stpf = stpq;
00129     }
00130     *brackt = true;
00131   } else if (std::abs(dp) < std::abs(*dx)) {
00132     *info = 3;
00133     bound = true;
00134     theta = (*fx - fp) * 3 / (*stp - *stx) + *dx + dp;
00135     d1 = std::abs(theta);
00136     d2 = std::abs(*dx);
00137     d1 = max(d1, d2);
00138     d2 = std::abs(dp);
00139     s = max(d1, d2);
00140     d3 = theta / s;
00141     d1 = 0.0;
00142     d2 = d3 * d3 - *dx / s *(dp / s);
00143     gamma = s * std::sqrt((max(d1, d2)));
00144     if (*stp > *stx) {
00145       gamma = -gamma;
00146     }
00147     p = gamma - dp + theta;
00148     q = gamma + (*dx - dp) + gamma;
00149     r = p / q;
00150     if (r < 0.0 && gamma != 0.0) {
00151       stpc = *stp + r *(*stx - *stp);
00152     } else if (*stp > *stx) {
00153       stpc = stpmax;
00154     } else {
00155       stpc = stpmin;
00156     }
00157     stpq = *stp + dp /(dp - *dx) * (*stx - *stp);
00158     if (*brackt) {
00159       if ((d1 = *stp - stpc, std::abs(d1)) <
00160           (d2 = *stp - stpq, std::abs(d2))) {
00161         stpf = stpc;
00162       } else {
00163         stpf = stpq;
00164       }
00165     } else {
00166       if ((d1 = *stp - stpc, std::abs(d1)) >
00167           (d2 = *stp - stpq, std::abs(d2))) {
00168         stpf = stpc;
00169       } else {
00170         stpf = stpq;
00171       }
00172     }
00173   } else {
00174     *info = 4;
00175     bound = false;
00176     if (*brackt) {
00177       theta =(fp - *fy) * 3 / (*sty - *stp) + *dy + dp;
00178       d1 = std::abs(theta);
00179       d2 = std::abs(*dy);
00180       d1 = max(d1, d2);
00181       d2 = std::abs(dp);
00182       s = max(d1, d2);
00183       d1 = theta / s;
00184       gamma = s * std::sqrt(d1 * d1 - *dy / s * (dp / s));
00185       if (*stp > *sty) {
00186         gamma = -gamma;
00187       }
00188       p = gamma - dp + theta;
00189       q = gamma - dp + gamma + *dy;
00190       r = p / q;
00191       stpc = *stp + r * (*sty - *stp);
00192       stpf = stpc;
00193     } else if (*stp > *stx) {
00194       stpf = stpmax;
00195     } else {
00196       stpf = stpmin;
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00200   if (fp > *fx) {
00201     *sty = *stp;
00202     *fy = fp;
00203     *dy = dp;
00204   } else {
00205     if (sgnd < 0.0) {
00206       *sty = *stx;
00207       *fy = *fx;
00208       *dy = *dx;
00209     }
00210     *stx = *stp;
00211     *fx = fp;
00212     *dx = dp;
00213   }
00214 
00215   stpf = min(stpmax, stpf);
00216   stpf = max(stpmin, stpf);
00217   *stp = stpf;
00218   if (*brackt && bound) {
00219     if (*sty > *stx) {
00220       d1 = *stx + (*sty - *stx) * 0.66;
00221       *stp = min(d1, *stp);
00222     } else {
00223       d1 = *stx + (*sty - *stx) * 0.66;
00224       *stp = max(d1, *stp);
00225     }
00226   }
00227 
00228   return;
00229 }
00230 }
00231 
00232 namespace MeCab {
00233 
00234 class LBFGS::Mcsrch {
00235  private:
00236   int infoc, stage1, brackt;
00237   double finit, dginit, dgtest, width, width1;
00238   double stx, fx, dgx, sty, fy, dgy, stmin, stmax;
00239 
00240  public:
00241   Mcsrch():
00242       infoc(0),
00243       stage1(0),
00244       brackt(0),
00245       finit(0.0), dginit(0.0), dgtest(0.0), width(0.0), width1(0.0),
00246       stx(0.0), fx(0.0), dgx(0.0), sty(0.0), fy(0.0), dgy(0.0),
00247       stmin(0.0), stmax(0.0) {}
00248 
00249   void mcsrch(int size,
00250               double *x,
00251               double f, const double *g, double *s,
00252               double *stp,
00253               int *info, int *nfev, double *wa, bool orthant, double C) {
00254     static const double p5 = 0.5;
00255     static const double p66 = 0.66;
00256     static const double xtrapf = 4.0;
00257     static const int maxfev = 20;
00258 
00259     /* Parameter adjustments */
00260     --wa;
00261     --s;
00262     --g;
00263     --x;
00264 
00265     if (*info == -1) goto L45;
00266     infoc = 1;
00267 
00268     if (size <= 0 || *stp <= 0.0) return;
00269 
00270     dginit = ddot_(size, &g[1], &s[1]);
00271     if (dginit >= 0.0) return;
00272 
00273     brackt = false;
00274     stage1 = true;
00275     *nfev = 0;
00276     finit = f;
00277     dgtest = ftol * dginit;
00278     width = lb3_1_stpmax - lb3_1_stpmin;
00279     width1 = width / p5;
00280     for (int j = 1; j <= size; ++j) {
00281       wa[j] = x[j];
00282     }
00283 
00284     stx = 0.0;
00285     fx = finit;
00286     dgx = dginit;
00287     sty = 0.0;
00288     fy = finit;
00289     dgy = dginit;
00290 
00291     while (true) {
00292       if (brackt) {
00293         stmin = min(stx, sty);
00294         stmax = max(stx, sty);
00295       } else {
00296         stmin = stx;
00297         stmax = *stp + xtrapf * (*stp - stx);
00298       }
00299 
00300       *stp = max(*stp, lb3_1_stpmin);
00301       *stp = min(*stp, lb3_1_stpmax);
00302 
00303       if ((brackt && ((*stp <= stmin || *stp >= stmax) ||
00304                       *nfev >= maxfev - 1 || infoc == 0)) ||
00305           (brackt && (stmax - stmin <= xtol * stmax))) {
00306         *stp = stx;
00307       }
00308 
00309       if (orthant) {
00310         for (int j = 1; j <= size; ++j) {
00311           double grad_neg = 0.0;
00312           double grad_pos = 0.0;
00313           double grad = 0.0;
00314           if (wa[j] == 0.0) {
00315             grad_neg = g[j] - 1.0 / C;
00316             grad_pos = g[j] + 1.0 / C;
00317           } else {
00318             grad_pos = grad_neg = g[j] + 1.0 * sigma(wa[j]) / C;
00319           }
00320           if (grad_neg > 0.0) {
00321             grad = grad_neg;
00322           } else if (grad_pos < 0.0) {
00323             grad = grad_pos;
00324           } else {
00325             grad = 0.0;
00326           }
00327           const double p = pi(s[j], -grad);
00328           const double xi = wa[j] == 0.0 ? sigma(-grad) : sigma(wa[j]);
00329           x[j] = pi(wa[j] + *stp * p, xi);
00330         }
00331       } else {
00332         for (int j = 1; j <= size; ++j) {
00333           x[j] = wa[j] + *stp * s[j];
00334         }
00335       }
00336       *info = -1;
00337       return;
00338 
00339    L45:
00340       *info = 0;
00341       ++(*nfev);
00342       double dg = ddot_(size, &g[1], &s[1]);
00343       double ftest1 = finit + *stp * dgtest;
00344 
00345       if (brackt && ((*stp <= stmin || *stp >= stmax) || infoc == 0)) {
00346         *info = 6;
00347       }
00348       if (*stp == lb3_1_stpmax && f <= ftest1 && dg <= dgtest) {
00349         *info = 5;
00350       }
00351       if (*stp == lb3_1_stpmin && (f > ftest1 || dg >= dgtest)) {
00352         *info = 4;
00353       }
00354       if (*nfev >= maxfev) {
00355         *info = 3;
00356       }
00357       if (brackt && stmax - stmin <= xtol * stmax) {
00358         *info = 2;
00359       }
00360       if (f <= ftest1 && std::abs(dg) <= lb3_1_gtol * (-dginit)) {
00361         *info = 1;
00362       }
00363 
00364       if (*info != 0) {
00365         return;
00366       }
00367 
00368       if (stage1 && f <= ftest1 && dg >= min(ftol, lb3_1_gtol) * dginit) {
00369         stage1 = false;
00370       }
00371 
00372       if (stage1 && f <= fx && f > ftest1) {
00373         double fm = f - *stp * dgtest;
00374         double fxm = fx - stx * dgtest;
00375         double fym = fy - sty * dgtest;
00376         double dgm = dg - dgtest;
00377         double dgxm = dgx - dgtest;
00378         double dgym = dgy - dgtest;
00379         mcstep(&stx, &fxm, &dgxm, &sty, &fym, &dgym, stp, fm, dgm, &brackt,
00380                stmin, stmax, &infoc);
00381         fx = fxm + stx * dgtest;
00382         fy = fym + sty * dgtest;
00383         dgx = dgxm + dgtest;
00384         dgy = dgym + dgtest;
00385       } else {
00386         mcstep(&stx, &fx, &dgx, &sty, &fy, &dgy, stp, f, dg, &brackt,
00387                stmin, stmax, &infoc);
00388       }
00389 
00390       if (brackt) {
00391         double d1 = 0.0;
00392         if ((d1 = sty - stx, std::abs(d1)) >= p66 * width1) {
00393           *stp = stx + p5 * (sty - stx);
00394         }
00395         width1 = width;
00396         width = (d1 = sty - stx, std::abs(d1));
00397       }
00398     }
00399 
00400     return;
00401   }
00402 };
00403 
00404 void LBFGS::clear() {
00405   iflag_ = iscn = nfev = iycn = point = npt =
00406       iter = info = ispt = isyt = iypt = 0;
00407   stp = stp1 = 0.0;
00408   diag_.clear();
00409   w_.clear();
00410   delete mcsrch_;
00411   mcsrch_ = 0;
00412 }
00413 
00414 void LBFGS::lbfgs_optimize(int size,
00415                            int msize,
00416                            double *x,
00417                            double f,
00418                            const double *g,
00419                            double *diag,
00420                            double *w,
00421                            bool orthant,
00422                            double C,
00423                            int *iflag) {
00424   double yy = 0.0;
00425   double ys = 0.0;
00426   int bound = 0;
00427   int cp = 0;
00428 
00429   --diag;
00430   --g;
00431   --x;
00432   --w;
00433 
00434   if (!mcsrch_) mcsrch_ = new Mcsrch;
00435 
00436   if (*iflag == 1) goto L172;
00437   if (*iflag == 2) goto L100;
00438 
00439   // initialization
00440   if (*iflag == 0) {
00441     point = 0;
00442     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00443       diag[i] = 1.0;
00444     }
00445     ispt = size + (msize << 1);
00446     iypt = ispt + size * msize;
00447     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00448       w[ispt + i] = -g[i] * diag[i];
00449     }
00450     stp1 = 1.0 / std::sqrt(ddot_(size, &g[1], &g[1]));
00451   }
00452 
00453   // MAIN ITERATION LOOP
00454   while (true) {
00455     ++iter;
00456     info = 0;
00457     if (iter == 1) goto L165;
00458     if (iter > size) bound = size;
00459 
00460     // COMPUTE -H*G USING THE FORMULA GIVEN IN: Nocedal, J. 1980,
00461     // "Updating quasi-Newton matrices with limited storage",
00462     // Mathematics of Computation, Vol.24, No.151, pp. 773-782.
00463     ys = ddot_(size, &w[iypt + npt + 1], &w[ispt + npt + 1]);
00464     yy = ddot_(size, &w[iypt + npt + 1], &w[iypt + npt + 1]);
00465     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00466       diag[i] = ys / yy;
00467     }
00468 
00469  L100:
00470     cp = point;
00471     if (point == 0) cp = msize;
00472     w[size + cp] = 1.0 / ys;
00473 
00474     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00475       w[i] = -g[i];
00476     }
00477 
00478     bound = min(iter - 1, msize);
00479 
00480     cp = point;
00481     for (int i = 1; i <= bound; ++i) {
00482       --cp;
00483       if (cp == -1) cp = msize - 1;
00484       double sq = ddot_(size, &w[ispt + cp * size + 1], &w[1]);
00485       int inmc = size + msize + cp + 1;
00486       iycn = iypt + cp * size;
00487       w[inmc] = w[size + cp + 1] * sq;
00488       double d = -w[inmc];
00489       daxpy_(size, d, &w[iycn + 1], &w[1]);
00490     }
00491 
00492     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00493       w[i] = diag[i] * w[i];
00494     }
00495 
00496     for (int i = 1; i <= bound; ++i) {
00497       double yr = ddot_(size, &w[iypt + cp * size + 1], &w[1]);
00498       double beta = w[size + cp + 1] * yr;
00499       int inmc = size + msize + cp + 1;
00500       beta = w[inmc] - beta;
00501       iscn = ispt + cp * size;
00502       daxpy_(size, beta, &w[iscn + 1], &w[1]);
00503       ++cp;
00504       if (cp == msize) cp = 0;
00505     }
00506 
00507     // STORE THE NEW SEARCH DIRECTION
00508     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00509       w[ispt + point * size + i] = w[i];
00510     }
00511 
00512  L165:
00513     // OBTAIN THE ONE-DIMENSIONAL MINIMIZER OF THE FUNCTION
00514     // BY USING THE LINE SEARCH ROUTINE MCSRCH
00515     nfev = 0;
00516     stp = 1.0;
00517     if (iter == 1) {
00518       stp = stp1;
00519     }
00520     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00521       w[i] = g[i];
00522     }
00523 
00524  L172:
00525     mcsrch_->mcsrch(size, &x[1], f, &g[1], &w[ispt + point * size + 1],
00526                     &stp, &info, &nfev, &diag[1], orthant, C);
00527     if (info == -1) {
00528       *iflag = 1;  // next value
00529       return;
00530     }
00531     if (info != 1) {
00532       std::cerr << "The line search routine mcsrch failed: error code:"
00533                 << info << std::endl;
00534       *iflag = -1;
00535       return;
00536     }
00537 
00538     // COMPUTE THE NEW STEP AND GRADIENT CHANGE
00539     npt = point * size;
00540     for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {
00541       w[ispt + npt + i] = stp * w[ispt + npt + i];
00542       w[iypt + npt + i] = g[i] - w[i];
00543     }
00544     ++point;
00545     if (point == msize) point = 0;
00546 
00547     double gnorm = std::sqrt(ddot_(size, &g[1], &g[1]));
00548     double xnorm = max(1.0, std::sqrt(ddot_(size, &x[1], &x[1])));
00549     if (gnorm / xnorm <= eps) {
00550       *iflag = 0;  // OK terminated
00551       return;
00552     }
00553   }
00554 
00555   return;
00556 }
00557 }
